name: Free Online PDF Encrypt Decrypt Tool - ATools
description: Free online PDF encrypt decrypt tool: Use AES-256-GCM to encrypt PDF files to JSON, and decrypt to restore original PDF (pure frontend local processing).
seoDescription: Free online PDF encrypt decrypt tool that uses AES-256-GCM + PBKDF2(SHA-256) to locally encrypt entire PDF files in the browser and outputs savable encrypted JSON. Can also decrypt in the tool by entering a password to restore the original PDF. Due to pure static site limitations, this tool doesn't generate standard PDF open passwords but provides secure file-level encryption containers, suitable for private PDF backup and temporary transfer.

ui.note: Note: Due to pure static site limitations, this tool cannot perform standard PDF 'open password' encryption/decryption. Instead, it uses AES-256-GCM to encrypt the entire PDF file to JSON, which can be decrypted in this tool to restore the original PDF.
